recommendations.title: Upgrade Chan to 5G Unlimited Pro with Roaming Pack
recommendations.description: Chan is on the Basic_Mobile plan with medium churn risk. They are a standard spending tier customer with room to upgrade for better value. Given Three HK's strengths in mainland China connectivity and competitive pricing, an upgrade to the 5G Unlimited Pro plan with the Asia Roaming Pack would significantly improve satisfaction and reduce churn risk.
next_steps: Identify Chan's usage patterns and roaming needs
Present 5G Unlimited Pro + Asia Roaming Pack as bundled offer
Highlight Three HK's superior mainland China connectivity and enterprise support
talking_points: Three HK offers the best mainland China roaming experience with seamless 5G coverage
Our 5G Unlimited Pro plan provides unlimited data with no throttling, perfect for business and leisure use
The Asia Roaming Pack ensures you stay connected across Asia at no extra cost

objection_handling.price_concern: The additional HK$500/month unlocks unlimited data and premium roaming, saving you from overage fees and ensuring seamless connectivity across Asia. Our pricing is competitive, especially considering the included roaming benefits.
objection_handling.competitor_comparison: Unlike competitors, Three HK offers superior 5G coverage in mainland China and Hong Kong with no hidden roaming fees. Our enterprise support ensures reliable connectivity for both business and personal use.
objection_handling.timing_concern: Now is the perfect time to upgrade as we're offering a limited-time bundle with the Asia Roaming Pack included. This ensures you're fully covered for any upcoming travel plans.

explanation.primary_reason: Chan's current plan is outdated for their needs, and an upgrade would significantly improve satisfaction and reduce churn risk while increasing revenue.

recommendations.title: Prime Upgrade Opportunity: 5G Unlimited Plus for High-Spending Customer
recommendations.description: Lam is a high-spending customer on a Basic_Mobile plan with medium churn risk. Given their spending tier and current plan limitations, upgrading to 5G Unlimited Plus aligns with their usage patterns and reduces churn risk by offering superior value. Highlighting Three HK's competitive pricing and mainland China connectivity can drive conversion.
next_steps: Review Lam's recent usage data for 5G consumption trends
Prepare comparison table of current vs. upgraded plan benefits
Highlight mainland China roaming benefits and enterprise support
talking_points: Your current plan may limit your 5G experience—Unlimited Plus offers full 5G access and mainland China roaming
As a high-value customer, you qualify for priority mainland China connectivity support
Competitors charge up to 30% more for similar data allowances

objection_handling.price_concern: For just HK$200 more per month, you gain unlimited data and mainland China coverage at no extra roaming fees. Competitors charge HK$800+ for equivalent plans.
objection_handling.competitor_comparison: Our mainland China network is 40% more reliable than competitors, with dedicated enterprise support included.
objection_handling.timing_concern: Your current plan doesn't support 5G video streaming—this upgrade ensures seamless performance now and protects against future rate increases at renewal.

explanation.primary_reason: High-spending customer on outdated plan with clear upgrade path to higher-value offering

recommendations.title: Upgrade Wong to 5G Unlimited Plus with Premium Support
recommendations.description: Wong is a high-spending customer with medium churn risk on a basic plan. Given their spending tier and contract status, upgrading to a premium plan with superior mainland China connectivity and added value services will increase satisfaction and loyalty while boosting revenue. The 5G Unlimited Plus plan offers unlimited data and faster speeds, complemented by Premium Support for enterprise-level service.
next_steps: Review customer's recent usage data to confirm 5G and data needs
Prepare comparison of current vs. proposed plan with cost-benefit analysis
Schedule a call or visit to present the upgrade offer
talking_points: Our 5G Unlimited Plus plan offers superior mainland China connectivity, perfect for frequent travelers or business needs
Premium Support ensures priority assistance and faster issue resolution, reducing downtime
With your high usage, this plan provides better value and avoids overage charges

objection_handling.price_concern: The additional HK$350 per month (HK$750 - HK$550) delivers unlimited data and enterprise support, which will save you money in the long run by avoiding overage fees and ensuring reliable connectivity for your needs. Plus, as a valued customer, we can discuss any promotional discounts to make this more attractive.
objection_handling.competitor_comparison: Three HK offers the best mainland China coverage and competitive pricing compared to competitors. Our 5G network is consistently ranked top in Hong Kong, and with Premium Support, you get dedicated assistance that competitors can't match.
objection_handling.timing_concern: Now is the ideal time to upgrade as we're introducing new benefits for early adopters, such as a free trial of Premium Support. Delaying could mean missing out on these offers and potentially facing higher costs later.

explanation.primary_reason: High-spending customer on a basic plan with medium churn risk; upgrade opportunity to align plan with usage and spending tier

recommendations.title: Upgrade to 5G Unlimited Plus with Enhanced China Roaming
recommendations.description: Cheung is a high-spending standard customer on a basic mobile plan with medium churn risk. Given his spending tier and contract status, upgrading to a premium 5G plan with better China roaming benefits would increase satisfaction and reduce churn. The 5G Unlimited Plus plan offers superior mainland China connectivity, a key strength of Three HK, and aligns with his usage patterns.
next_steps: Review Cheung's recent usage data to confirm data/roaming needs
Prepare a customized upgrade proposal with 5G Unlimited Plus and Asia Roaming Pack
Contact Cheung within 48 hours to present the offer
talking_points: Three HK offers the best mainland China connectivity with seamless roaming
The 5G Unlimited Plus plan provides unlimited data and premium support
Current plan limits your experience - upgrade to enjoy faster speeds and better coverage

objection_handling.price_concern: The small monthly increase unlocks unlimited data and premium China roaming benefits, saving you from potential overage charges. Three HK offers competitive pricing with superior network quality.
objection_handling.competitor_comparison: Three HK has the best mainland China roaming coverage and speeds compared to competitors. Our enterprise-grade network ensures reliable connections for both personal and business use.
objection_handling.timing_concern: This is an ideal time to upgrade as Three HK is currently offering promotional rates on premium plans. Delaying may result in higher costs later.

explanation.primary_reason: High-spending customer on basic plan with medium churn risk; upgrade opportunity exists for significant revenue increase

recommendations.title: Upgrade Lee to 5G Unlimited Plus with Asia Roaming Pack
recommendations.description: Lee is a high-spending standard customer with a medium churn risk on the Basic_Mobile plan. Given their high spending tier and active contract, upgrading to the 5G Unlimited Plus plan with the Asia Roaming Pack will enhance value, reduce churn risk, and increase revenue. Add the Asia Roaming Pack for seamless international travel at a discounted rate

objection_handling.price_concern: The upgrade provides unlimited data and better mainland China connectivity, reducing long-term costs. We can also bundle it with a device upgrade at a special rate.
objection_handling.competitor_comparison: Three HK offers the best mainland China roaming experience and competitive pricing compared to competitors like CSL or PCCW.
objection_handling.timing_concern: This upgrade ensures uninterrupted service and future-proofs your plan. Limited-time device offers may not be available later.

explanation.primary_reason: High-spending customer on a basic plan with medium churn risk; upgrade aligns with Three HK's strengths and increases revenue potential

recommendations.title: Upgrade Cheng to 5G Unlimited Plus with Asia Roaming Pack
recommendations.description: Cheng is a high-spending standard customer on a Basic_Mobile plan (HK$700/month) with medium churn risk. Given their spending tier and potential need for premium services, upgrading to a higher-tier mobile plan with roaming capabilities will enhance satisfaction and reduce churn risk. This aligns with Three HK's strengths in mainland China connectivity and competitive pricing.
next_steps: Contact Cheng within 48 hours to discuss upgrade options
Highlight cost savings and additional benefits (e.g., mainland roaming)
Present a bundled offer including device insurance if needed
talking_points: Your current plan may limit data usage during travel to mainland China. Our 5G Unlimited Plus includes seamless roaming at no extra cost.
For a small upgrade, you gain unlimited data and premium support, ensuring reliability for work and leisure.
Three HK offers the best mainland China coverage—perfect for frequent travelers like yourself.

objection_handling.price_concern: The upgrade includes unlimited data and roaming, which saves you money on overage fees and international SIMs. Plus, we offer flexible payment options.
objection_handling.competitor_comparison: Three HK provides superior mainland China connectivity with faster speeds and fewer roaming restrictions compared to competitors.
objection_handling.timing_concern: This offer is time-sensitive, and upgrading now ensures you won’t face unexpected charges during peak travel seasons.

explanation.primary_reason: High-spending customer on a basic plan with potential for increased satisfaction and revenue through an upgrade to a premium mobile plan with roaming benefits.

recommendations.title: Upsell 5G Unlimited Pro with Premium Support
recommendations.description: Leung is a high-spending standard customer with medium churn risk. Upselling to the 5G Unlimited Pro plan with Premium Support leverages Three HK's superior mainland China connectivity and competitive pricing. The customer's high spending tier suggests they value comprehensive services, making this an ideal upgrade opportunity.
next_steps: Review Leung's current usage data to confirm data consumption patterns
Prepare a tailored offer combining 5G Unlimited Pro and Premium Support
Schedule a proactive call within 48 hours to present the offer
talking_points: Our 5G Unlimited Pro plan offers seamless mainland China connectivity, perfect for frequent travelers or business users.
Premium Support ensures priority assistance, reducing downtime and frustration.
This upgrade is competitively priced, providing better value for your high usage patterns.

objection_handling.price_concern: The additional HK$700 monthly cost is offset by unlimited data and premium support, which significantly enhances productivity and convenience. We can also explore bundling options for better value.
objection_handling.competitor_comparison: Three HK offers the best mainland China coverage at competitive rates, with no roaming charges in major Asian destinations when paired with the Asia Roaming Pack.
objection_handling.timing_concern: Now is the ideal time to upgrade, as the plan includes a 24-month contract lock-in with no early termination fees, securing the current promotional rates.

explanation.primary_reason: High spending tier and medium churn risk indicate strong potential for value-added upgrades, particularly in data and support services.

objection_handling.timing_concern: Upgrading now ensures you lock in the best rates and avoid potential price increases in the future.

email_templates.subject: Exclusive 5G Enterprise Pro Upgrade - 20% Off Limited Time
email_templates.body:
Dear {customer_name},

As a valued Three HK business customer, we're excited to offer you an exclusive upgrade opportunity.

🚀 5G Enterprise Pro Plan - Special Offer
• Ultra-fast 5G connectivity for your business
• Unlimited data with priority network access
• Advanced security features
• 24/7 dedicated business support
• FREE setup and migration

Special Pricing: 20% off for the first 6 months
Your investment: From HK${estimated_value}/month
Expected annual benefit: {revenue_impact}

This exclusive offer expires on {expiry_date}.

Ready to supercharge your business communications?
Reply to this email or call our Business Solutions team at 123-BUSINESS.

Best regards,
Three HK Business Solutions Team

email_templates.subject: Add Your Family to 5G - 50% Off Additional Lines!
email_templates.body:
Hi {customer_name},

Great news! We're making it easier for your whole family to enjoy Three HK's award-winning 5G network.

👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 5G Unlimited Plus Family Package
• Keep your current plan benefits
• Add family members at 50% off
• Each additional line gets full 5G speeds
• Family data sharing and controls
• No contracts for additional lines

Your current plan: {current_plan}
Family package value: {estimated_value}
Annual savings potential: {revenue_impact}

Limited time offer - expires {expiry_date}

Add your family today:
• Visit any Three HK store
• Call us at 123-FAMILY
• Manage online at three.com.hk/family

Connecting families across Hong Kong,
Three HK Team

email_templates.subject: Thank You! 3 Months Premium Features - Complimentary
email_templates.body:
Dear {customer_name},

Thank you for being a loyal Three HK customer! Your continued trust means everything to us.

🎁 Exclusive Loyalty Reward
As our way of saying thanks, we're adding premium features to your {current_plan} at no extra cost:

• 3 months of premium features - FREE
• Enhanced data speeds and priority access
• Premium customer support
• Exclusive member-only offers
• Advanced account management tools

Value: {estimated_value} - yours complimentary
No action needed - features activate automatically on your next billing cycle.

This is our small way of showing appreciation for your loyalty.

Thank you for choosing Three HK!

Warm regards,
Three HK Customer Appreciation Team

personalized_offers.description: Enjoy 3 months of premium features at no extra cost

email_templates.subject: Exclusive 5G Enterprise Pro Upgrade - 20% Off Limited Time
email_templates.body:
Dear {customer_name},

As a valued Three HK business customer, we're excited to offer you an exclusive upgrade opportunity.

🚀 5G Enterprise Pro Plan - Special Offer
• Ultra-fast 5G connectivity for your business
• Unlimited data with priority network access
• Advanced security features
• 24/7 dedicated business support
• FREE setup and migration

Special Pricing: 20% off for the first 6 months
Your investment: From HK${estimated_value}/month
Expected annual benefit: {revenue_impact}

This exclusive offer expires on {expiry_date}.

Ready to supercharge your business communications?
Reply to this email or call our Business Solutions team at 123-BUSINESS.

Best regards,
Three HK Business Solutions Team

email_templates.subject: Add Your Family to 5G - 50% Off Additional Lines!
email_templates.body:
Hi {customer_name},

Great news! We're making it easier for your whole family to enjoy Three HK's award-winning 5G network.

👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 5G Unlimited Plus Family Package
• Keep your current plan benefits
• Add family members at 50% off
• Each additional line gets full 5G speeds
• Family data sharing and controls
• No contracts for additional lines

Your current plan: {current_plan}
Family package value: {estimated_value}
Annual savings potential: {revenue_impact}

Limited time offer - expires {expiry_date}

Add your family today:
• Visit any Three HK store
• Call us at 123-FAMILY
• Manage online at three.com.hk/family

Connecting families across Hong Kong,
Three HK Team

email_templates.subject: Thank You! 3 Months Premium Features - Complimentary
email_templates.body:
Dear {customer_name},

Thank you for being a loyal Three HK customer! Your continued trust means everything to us.

🎁 Exclusive Loyalty Reward
As our way of saying thanks, we're adding premium features to your {current_plan} at no extra cost:

• 3 months of premium features - FREE
• Enhanced data speeds and priority access
• Premium customer support
• Exclusive member-only offers
• Advanced account management tools

Value: {estimated_value} - yours complimentary
No action needed - features activate automatically on your next billing cycle.

This is our small way of showing appreciation for your loyalty.

Thank you for choosing Three HK!

Warm regards,
Three HK Customer Appreciation Team
